DOC.brief_summary: The mucociliary system nasal mucosa , compose ciliated respiratory epithelium , mucous blanket , mucus-producing gland , important defense component respiratory system . Therefore , important maintain intact inner respiratory mucociliary epithelium reconstruction large respiratory defect development tissue engineering trachea . Hyaluronan derivative , biodegradable non-immunogenic , already prove effective scaffold chondrocytes . However , feasibility use scaffold respiratory epithelial cell remain unexplored . The aim study investigate effect hyaluronan include concentration molecular weight mucociliary differentiation human respiratory epithelial cell ( HREC ) . If hyaluronan able promote mucociliary differentiation HREC , investigator synthesize hyaluronan derivative serve ideal biomaterials respiratory tissue engineering tissue-engineered trachea future .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Mechanism Hyaluronan Mucociliary Differentiation Human Respiratory Epithelial Cells
